metadata.description: Albert is a struggling Los Angeles stand-up comic, still living at home with his parents. One night, while drunk on tequila, Albert falls into a mysterious agave plant and becomes The Blue Agave, Mexican superhero! With the help of his best-friend Tony, better known as Worm, Albert might just save the world! From Family Guy writer Kirker Butler!
metadata.name: Blue Agave and Worm
